<font face="微软雅黑"><font size="5"><font color="#ff0000">八段锦，源远流长的传统健身法</font></font></font><img src="https://static.52pojie.cn/static/image/smiley/laohu/laohu33.gif" smilieid="997" border="0" alt=""><img src="https://static.52pojie.cn/static/image/smiley/laohu/laohu33.gif" smilieid="997" border="0" alt=""><img src="https://static.52pojie.cn/static/image/smiley/laohu/laohu33.gif" smilieid="997" border="0" alt=""><br>
<font color="#24292f"><font face="微软雅黑"><font size="5">以其简单易学、动静结合、舒缓自然而广受欢迎。</font></font></font><br>
<font color="#24292f"><font face="微软雅黑"><font size="5"><br>

<br>
<font color="#24292f"><font face="微软雅黑"><font size="5">它不仅能够强身健体，还能调节身心，增进健康。</font></font></font><br>
<br>
<font color="#24292f"><font face="微软雅黑"><font size="5">以下是</font></font></font><font face="微软雅黑"><font size="5"><font color="#ff0000">八段锦的详细解说及四套全套教程</font></font></font><img src="https://static.52pojie.cn/static/image/smiley/laohu/laohu3.gif" smilieid="993" border="0" alt=""><img src="https://static.52pojie.cn/static/image/smiley/laohu/laohu3.gif" smilieid="993" border="0" alt=""><img src="https://static.52pojie.cn/static/image/smiley/laohu/laohu3.gif" smilieid="993" border="0" alt=""><font color="#24292f"><font face="微软雅黑"><font size="5"><br>
